about_the_game:
Step into the haunting world of Stranded Souls, a co-op horror game crafted by a passionate 2-person team.

Designed to challenge your wits and test your courage, this game lets you gather up to 4 players to face the unknown, unravel mysteries, and survive the horrors that lie ahead.

The journey begins in our first map, The Mansion, set in the late 1890s. Decades ago, a devastating fire claimed the life of a young girl. Witnesses whispered that her mother, consumed by a fit of rage, lit the flames that sealed their doom. But that was only the beginning...

The girl's vengeful spirit roams the halls, watching, waiting. Can you uncover the truth behind the tragedy while evading her wrath? Or will you and your team become the next lost souls in her tale?

One of the game's most unique elements is the inclusion of piano playing as a key mechanic. In Stranded Souls, the piano is not just a background prop—it plays a vital role in the story and gameplay. Certain melodies hold the power to calm the girl's spirit. Will you have the courage and skill to play the right tune when it matters most?

Stranded Souls offers two gameplay modes:

  • Story Mode: Complete the tasks within the house to calm the vengeful spirit and guide it to peace. But beware—if you fail, the price will be your life and your soul.

  • Burn and Purify Mode: For those seeking pure adrenaline, this mode is for you. Work together to burn and purify cursed objects while surviving relentless attacks from the monster.

With plans for 5 immersive maps, Stranded Souls delivers a variety of spine-chilling environments and unforgettable challenges.

Our Vision and Mission

As a two-person development team, we are dedicated to creating a co-op horror game that blends immersive storytelling with intense, pulse-pounding gameplay. Our vision is to craft a world where players always feel nervous, the tension of every encounter, and the satisfaction of overcoming shared fears with their team.

Stranded Souls is not just a game—it’s an experience. We aim to deliver a title that becomes a defining moment in indie horror gaming, captivating players with its atmosphere, depth, and replayability.

Join us on this terrifying journey,and help us to shape the future of Stranded Souls. Share your thoughts,and be part of building ultimate co-op horror experience.
